tier.item: For Kinande, it is better to say that the operator in Spec, CP is a Logophoric operator controlled by the matrix
subject, not an S or A operator. The reason is because first and second person pronouns in the embedded CP do
not shift their reference in Kinande the way they do in Slave. It is not the exact nature of the operator that is
crucial here, but rather its location and the features that it bears.
